articles.title: what is peecycling: human urine has nutrients crops need to thrive
articles.description: The need to find alternative sources for fertilizer have become urgent as chemical fertilizer shortages from the Ukrainian war threaten countries globally.
articles.content:
Researchers say human urine or peecycling could be a liquid gold alternative to chemical fertilizers.

articles.title: Autistic assemblymember running for Congress says disabled people are "invisible by exclusion"
articles.description: "While it's an amazing thing, I think that what's more important is that there are people understanding that it's also a really lonely thing," Assemblymember Yuh-Line Niou told Insider.
articles.content:
The halls of Congress have yet to see an openly autistic legislator, but New York Assemblymember Yuh-Line Niou could change that.
